name: EXPLORE SAIGON - VIETNAMESE FOOD - KID CITY
description:
Are you busy, have a long schedule, or have too many places to visit? If you
have just a little time in Vietnam, such as one or two days, you may ask
yourself questions like, “What will you do?” “Where can I enjoy my trip?” PLEASE
DON’T WORRY ABOUT THAT. Let us give you some interesting choices. 
As I said about myself, my friend and I are the local boys in Ho Chi Minh City,
therefore we know many interesting places and can take you to some some cheap
hotels. The tour is written as an example. 
You may contact us to consult any alterations depending on your interests
and financial conditions. We will discuss the best-expected trip for you. You
will feel that your money is well spent.
